cc.mallet.classify
Interface Boostable

All Known Implementing Classes:
BalancedWinnowTrainer, C45, C45Trainer, ConfidencePredictingClassifierTrainer, DecisionTreeTrainer, MaxEntGETrainer, MaxEntL1Trainer, MaxEntTrainer, MCMaxEntTrainer, NaiveBayesTrainer, RankMaxEntTrainer
public interface Boostable

This interface is a tag indicating that the classifier attends to the InstanceList.getInstanceWeight() weights when training.
